channel.title: Changing xp rate 704
channel.description: on my 704 source my xp rate is like runescape's how would i make it higher? because i cant find where i would change this.. thanks :)

item.title: Changing xp rate 704
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

Server src > com > rs > Settings.java

You’ll see this:

public static final int XP_RATE = 1; public static final int SKILLING_XP_RATE = 80; public static final int COMBAT _ XP_RATE = 95;
The space between T _ X is because this is without space: T_X

XP_RATE: Multiplier for the rates
SKILLING_XP_RATE: amount of exp to multiply the skill exp with (i.e: cutting uncut onyx gives 160 crafting exp. 160*80 = 12800 exp)
COMBAT _ XP_RATE: amount of xp for combat *10

Read full topic

item.title: Changing xp rate 704
item.dc:creator: @Orient Orient
item.description:
@Orient wrote:

Which XP are you trying to change? Combat or Skills?

For combat it would be in Settings.java, and for Skills it would be in the individual skill class files.

Read full topic
